name: STARCATCHERS
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

Download, unzip, and run vectorboy. Click the folder icon on the left, and then locate and double-click "STARCATCHERS.lua." If you don't see it, it is located in the folder named "games," which is inside the folder that vectorboy is inside of.

HOW TO PLAY

Pull stars into your heart using the intersection between your 2 lines of sight. Careful not to touch the boxes!

The game was designed to be played single player, but it could be a cute challenge for 2 as well ;)

CREDITS

Game made by Sean Wejebe

VectorBoy made by David Jalbert

Made July 2017 for Fantasy Console Jam
